name: Shoot The Dice (Nick Koby)
description:
You are a small brave dice who challenged a large and arrogant Dice King. Shoot at dice, collect dices, turn dice into bullets and keep dicing, cuz only you can dethrone your father!

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD to move, left mouse button to shoot (aim at different sides and corners of dices to get the score you need)
